en.pageTitle: Dog Emojis 🐶 Copy and Paste - LaughingEmoji.net
en.metaDescription: Copy and paste beautiful dog emojis 🐶🐕🦮🐕‍🦺 from the largest collection of canine emoticons. One-click copy for all your animal and pet expressions!
en.ogTitle: Dog Emojis 🐶 Copy and Paste - LaughingEmoji.net
en.ogDescription: The ultimate collection of dog emojis! Copy and paste 🐶🐕🦮🐕‍🦺 and more beautiful canine emojis with one click.
en.clickToCopy: Click any emoji to copy to clipboard!
en.exploreDescription: Explore and copy a diverse collection of dog emojis for your messages and social media.
en.footerDescription: Your ultimate resource for dog emojis. Discover, copy, and share the perfect canine emoticon for any occasion.
en.dogEmojiListTitle: All Dog Emojis and Their Meanings
en.dogEmojiListDescription: Here is a list of all available dog emojis with explanations of their common usage and meaning:
en.dogEmoji1: 🐶 Dog Face: A friendly and common emoji used to represent dogs, pets, or cuteness.
en.dogEmoji2: 🐕 Dog: The full-body version of a dog, often used to talk about a specific dog or canine in general.
en.dogEmoji3: 🦮 Guide Dog: Represents a service animal, often a Labrador or Golden Retriever, trained to assist people with visual impairments.
en.dogEmoji4: 🐕‍🦺 Service Dog: A newer emoji that shows a service dog with its harness, used for various types of assistance animals.
en.dogEmoji5: 🐩 Poodle: Represents the Poodle breed, known for its intelligence and curly hair.
en.dogEmoji6: 🌭 Hot Dog: Although a food item, it can be used humorously to represent a 'wiener dog' or a Dachshund.
en.dogEmojiUsageDescription: Dog emojis are versatile and can be used in many different scenarios:
en.dogUsage1: To express love for dogs: 'I love my 🐶!' or 'Dogs are the best 🐕.'
en.dogUsage2: When talking about your pet: 'Taking my 🐶 for a walk.'
en.dogUsage3: To denote cuteness or loyalty: 'You're so loyal, like a 🐕.'
en.dogUsage4: Referring to service animals: 'The man was accompanied by his 🦮.'
en.dogHistoryDescription: The first dog emoji (🐶) was part of the original set created by SoftBank and was later adopted into Unicode. The full-body dog (🐕) was added later, followed by the specific Guide Dog (🦮) and Service Dog (🐕‍🦺) emojis, reflecting a greater push for diversity and specific representations in emoji culture.
en.dogStoryTitle: Fun Facts & Stories About Dog Emojis
en.dogStoryDescription: The hot dog emoji (🌭) is often used in a playful, punny way to refer to Dachshunds, which are sometimes called 'wiener dogs.' The diverse dog emojis available today allow for more specific and inclusive conversations about different breeds and roles of dogs in our lives.

zh.pageTitle: 狗表情符号 🐶 复制粘贴 - LaughingEmoji.net
zh.metaDescription: 从最大的狗表情符号集合中复制粘贴美丽的狗表情符号🐶🐕🦮🐕‍🦺。一键复制，满足您所有动物和宠物表达！
zh.ogTitle: 狗表情符号 🐶 复制粘贴 - LaughingEmoji.net
zh.ogDescription: 狗表情符号的终极集合！一键复制粘贴🐶🐕🦮🐕‍🦺等更多美丽的狗表情符号。
zh.mainTitle: 狗表情符号 🐶 复制粘贴 🐕
zh.clickToCopy: 点击任意表情符号即可复制到剪贴板！
zh.exploreDescription: 探索并复制各种狗表情符号，用于您的消息和社交媒体。
zh.footerDescription: 您获取狗表情符号的终极资源。发现、复制和分享适合任何场合的完美狗表情符号。
zh.dogEmojiListTitle: 所有狗表情符号及其含义
zh.dogEmojiListDescription: 以下是所有可用的狗表情符号列表，并附有其常见用法和含义的解释：
zh.dogEmoji1: 🐶 狗脸：一个友好且常见的表情符号，用于代表狗、宠物或可爱。
zh.dogEmoji2: 🐕 狗：狗的全身体版本，通常用于泛指特定的狗或犬科动物。
zh.dogEmoji3: 🦮 导盲犬：代表服务性动物，通常是拉布拉多犬或金毛猎犬，经过训练以协助视障人士。
zh.dogEmoji4: 🐕‍🦺 服务犬：一个较新的表情符号，展示了穿着背带的服务犬，用于各种类型的辅助动物。
zh.dogEmoji5: 🐩 贵宾犬：代表贵宾犬品种，以其聪明和卷发而闻名。
zh.dogEmoji6: 🌭 热狗：虽然是一种食物，但可以幽默地用来代表“香肠狗”或腊肠犬。
zh.dogEmojiUsageTitle: 狗表情符号的使用场景
zh.dogEmojiUsageDescription: 狗表情符号用途广泛，可用于多种不同的场景：
zh.dogUsage1: 表达对狗的喜爱：“我爱我的 🐶！”或“狗是最好的 🐕。”
zh.dogUsage2: 谈论你的宠物时：“带我的 🐶 去散步。”
zh.dogUsage3: 表示可爱或忠诚：“你真忠诚，像一只 🐕。”
zh.dogUsage4: 提及服务性动物：“那个人由他的 🦮 陪伴。”
zh.dogHistoryTitle: 狗表情符号的发展历史
zh.dogHistoryDescription: 第一个狗表情符号 (🐶) 是 SoftBank 创建的原始集合的一部分，后来被纳入 Unicode。随后添加了全身的狗 (🐕)，接着是特定的导盲犬 (🦮) 和服务犬 (🐕‍🦺) 表情符号，这反映了在表情符号文化中对多样性和特定代表性的更大推动。
zh.dogStoryTitle: 关于狗表情符号的趣闻轶事
zh.dogStoryDescription: 热狗表情符号 (🌭) 经常被俏皮地用来指代腊肠犬，因为它们有时被称为“香肠狗”。今天提供的多样化的狗表情符号使得关于不同品种和狗在生活中所扮演角色的对话更加具体和包容。
